top-song.title: Will It Go Round in Circles

descr.p: "Will It Go Round in Circles" is a song written by Bruce Fisher and Billy Preston, and recorded by Preston for his 1972 album Music Is My Life. On its release as a single in 1973, the song was a number-one hit on the Billboard Hot 100 chart, and sold over a million copies.

The song was covered in the 2006 television soundtrack, That's So Raven Too!, and on the 2008 Band From TV album, Hoggin' All the Covers, with vocals by Hugh Laurie. It also appears on Martin Sexton's 2007 album Seeds and Eric Clapton's 2002 live DVD One More Car, One More Rider.
